about_the_game:
”TAKE THAT!”

Complete your trilogy of tunes with Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney – Trials and Tribulations Original Soundtrack, featuring 34 incredible tracks from all five cases making their debut in the West for the first time.

The 68+ minute soundtrack has been re-authored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
